channel.title: garage on amar
channel.description: Recent content in garage on amar

item.title: Alternative Sources
item.description: Some notes from a k20 6speed transmission refurbishment, this car was made in 2002, it is now the end of 2025. We pulled this apart so we can install a Cusco LSD into the unit. While this is removed I intend to replace whatever is ruined. Before pulling this out, I had noticed some notchyness when shifting between 1st->2nd, as well as the 3rd gear popping out of gear when on track.
